function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Need for concentration methods","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Conflicting results at low concentrations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased concentrations of no2 and pm2.5","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Induction process","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Propaganda","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of relaxation space","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor solubility and processing of graphene materials","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scalability and cost of graphene-based coatings","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Toxicity of nanomaterials","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nanoparticle health risks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contamination of glass coverslips","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Non-compliance with mask mandates","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient virus reduction","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mixed messaging","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to prioritize team safety","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased emphasis on personal and environmental hygiene","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Hazardous tasks","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cancellation of ad hoc events, travel restrictions, home quarantine, dissemination of fake news","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in building trust and transparency between public and healthcare authorities","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in topic modeling related to human interaction and interpretation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Large numbers of people entering parks against guidelines","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assumption of benefits from proximity to parks","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential bias in study selection","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of duplicate studies inclusion","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate rna extraction protocols","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporating uncertainty and variability in independent variables using a monte carlo approach may introduce errors in the modeling process.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Modeling sars-cov-2 rna copies/l of wastewater as a point estimate with a uniform distribution may lead to underestimation or overestimation of viral load.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Modeling the shedding rate of sars-cov-2 rna copies/g of feces as a log-uniform distribution may introduce variability that impacts the accuracy of infection prevalence estimates.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Viral rna shedding in stool not included in the model, leading to underestimation of prevalence.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty and variation in experimental workflow not accounted for in the model, leading to inaccurate estimations.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited availability of clinical prevalence data for direct comparisons, making it difficult to assess the model’s accuracy.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of quantitative predictions from viral rna concentrations in sewage to actual numbers of cases in the community","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monte carlo simulation estimation of infections in catchment basin","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate compliance with preventive guidelines during physical activity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Home-based exercise as a coping strategy during lockdown","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Occupants’ proximity in small spaces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of energy conservation awareness","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cultural differences impacting energy consumption patterns","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate representation of local population’s lifestyle and energy consumption habits","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Habit of leaving lights on when rooms are unoccupied due to cheap electricity","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Little changes in occupants’ attitude towards energy conservation","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fear among travelers due to outbreak spread","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased conflicts and crimes due to disparities and deprivations in cities","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fear and discomfort among citizens due to surveillance and data privacy concerns","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resistance from the general public towards the coupling of smart city and safe city concepts.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased dependence on digital platforms due to covid-19, leading to social and cultural reformation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited community engagement and participation","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Major shift to at-home work and self-isolated society in developed countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on old-school drawing culture and impersonal autocad representations due to contemporary addiction to digital narrative rich television shows and movies","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Extreme measures taken by citizens to prevent the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
